name: Rozhishka
description: Rozhishka is an emerging perfume company known for its unique approach to fragrance creation by blending traditional perfumery techniques with modern aesthetics. Founded by a group of passionate artisans, the company emphasizes high-quality, natural ingredients and aims to capture the essence of varied cultures through its scent portfolio. Their specialty lies in creating bespoke fragrances that resonate personally with customers, offering a personalized experience in every bottle.

name: Rua29
description: Rua29 is a niche perfume company that focuses on creating unique and artisanal fragrances. Established with a dedication to inspiring emotion through scent, Rua29 emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients and innovative techniques in their perfume-making process. The brand is known for its evocative storytelling behind each fragrance, drawing inspiration from various cultures and experiences, aiming to engage the customer in a sensory journey.

name: Rubeus
description: Rubeus is a niche perfume company known for its luxurious and artisanal scents. Founded by a team of fragrance enthusiasts, the brand focuses on creating unique and high-quality fragrances that capture the essence of individuality and elegance. The company emphasizes craftsmanship and the use of premium ingredients, aiming to provide not just a scent, but an emotional experience. Each fragrance tells a story and reflects a deep understanding of olfactory art, appealing to connoisseurs and fragrance lovers around the world.

name: Rubino
description: Rubino is a distinguished fragrance house known for blending traditional craftsmanship with modern aesthetics. Established with the intent to create unique, high-quality perfumes, Rubino has garnered attention for its artistic approach to scent creation. Each fragrance is inspired by stories and emotions, making them not just scents but olfactory experiences. The brand emphasizes sustainability and uses ethically sourced ingredients to craft its fragrances, catering to a growing market of conscious consumers seeking authenticity in their perfumes.

name: Ruby & Millie
description: Ruby & Millie is a cosmetics and fragrance brand known for its stylish yet accessible beauty products. Founded by celebrities Ruby and Millie, the brand successfully merges high-quality formulations with innovative designs. It was known for its fun and youthful ethos, specializing in makeup and perfumes that cater to a diverse audience while promoting self-expression and creativity.

name: Ruddy Water
description: Ruddy Water is a niche perfume company known for its artisanal approach to scent creation. Founded by a team of fragrance enthusiasts, the brand focuses on handcrafting unique and evocative fragrances that encapsulate personal stories and experiences. Their commitment to quality ingredients and sustainable practices is reflected in their small batch production, ensuring that each release is distinctive and exclusive.

name: Rude
description: Rude is a niche fragrance company known for its unique and edgy scents that appeal to a younger audience. Founded with the mission to challenge traditional notions of perfumery, Rude offers a variety of bold and vibrant fragrances that are designed to evoke individual expression and creativity. The brand emphasizes inclusivity and personal style, allowing customers to explore their identity through scent.

name: Rudross
description: Rudross is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating handcrafted, artisanal fragrances. Founded by the perfumer H. Rudross, the brand focuses on using high-quality, sustainable ingredients to craft unique and evocative scents. By fusing traditional perfumery techniques with modern art, Rudross aims to tell a story through each fragrance, appealing to connoisseurs of fine perfumes seeking originality and luxury.

name: Rue 37
description: Rue 37 is an artisanal perfume company specializing in creating high-quality, unique fragrance compositions. Founded with a passion for fragrance exploration, Rue 37 prides itself on blending traditional techniques with innovative concepts. Their offerings often center around sustainable sourcing and the celebration of diverse aromatic notes inspired by various cultural elements.

name: Rue Broca
description: Rue Broca is a niche perfumery brand based in Paris, France, that specializes in creating artisanal, handcrafted fragrances. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, the company draws inspiration from the artistic essence and cultural history of Paris, delivering unique scent compositions that reflect the city's charm. Rue Broca focuses on the use of high-quality ingredients and traditional perfumery techniques, offering an exclusive and intimate olfactory experience to its clientele.

name: Rue21
description: Rue21 is a specialty retailer that focuses on providing fashionable apparel, accessories, and footwear for young men and women. Founded in 2003, the brand has built a strong presence by offering an array of trendy clothing and scented products, including perfumes and body sprays. Rue21 emphasizes affordability and contemporary styles, catering primarily to a younger demographic that values self-expression through fashion. The company's perfume line is designed to complement its fashion offerings, allowing customers to indulge in personal fragrance choices that resonate with current trends.

name: Ruehl No. 925
description: Ruehl No. 925 was a lifestyle brand that originated from the Abercrombie & Fitch company, focusing primarily on apparel, accessories, and fragrances. Named after the street address of their headquarters in New York City, Ruehl No. 925 was designed to evoke the spirit of New York and aimed at the young adult demographic. The brand's fragrances were characterized by their sophisticated yet approachable scents, capturing both the essence of urban life and individual expression. The company has a reputation for producing fragrances that complement their apparel, adding an olfactory dimension to the overall lifestyle experience. Ruehl No. 925 ceased operations in 2010, but its fragrances are still remembered by fans of the brand.

name: Rufus Hound
description: Rufus Hound is a British comedian and actor who ventured into the perfume industry, launching his own fragrance line. The brand is known for its creative and whimsical approach to scent, incorporating Hound's distinct personality and humor into the fragrance experience. While Rufus Hound may not operate as a traditional perfume company, his offerings reflect his artistic influence and aim to connect with fans through unique aromatic experiences.

name: Rugby Club Toulonnais
description: Rugby Club Toulonnais is primarily known as a professional rugby union team based in Toulon, France. However, it has expanded its brand to include a range of lifestyle products, including perfumes. The perfume line reflects the strength and spirit of the rugby club, channeling athleticism and the passion of its fan base into the fragrance offerings. The brand emphasizes quality and a connection to rugby culture, appealing to both sports enthusiasts and fragrance aficionados.

name: Ruhr-Universität Bochum
description: Ruhr-Universität Bochum is a public research university located in Bochum, Germany. While primarily an educational institution, it has a strong focus on various disciplines, including chemistry and materials science. The university is known for its innovative research in the field of perfumery and fragrance chemistry, contributing to the development of new scent formulations and advancements in the perfume industry.

name: RUIK
description: RUIK is an innovative perfume brand that specializes in creating unique and artisanal fragrances. Founded with the mission to blend traditional perfume-making techniques with modern sensibilities, RUIK offers a diverse range of scent profiles that cater to various preferences and lifestyles. The company prides itself on using high-quality ingredients sourced from around the world, and emphasizes sustainability and eco-friendliness in its production processes. RUIK's story is rooted in a passion for olfactory art, and they continuously strive to push the boundaries of fragrance creation by collaborating with renowned perfumers.

name: Rundholz Parfums
description: Rundholz Parfums is a luxury perfume brand that originates from the German fashion design duo, Carsten and Claudia Rundholz. Known for their avant-garde approach, the brand combines elements of fashion and fragrance, creating unique, high-quality scents that reflect their artistic vision. Rundholz Parfums often offers fragrances that are unisex, and they place a significant emphasis on natural ingredients and sustainable practices. The brand embodies an experimental and artistic ethos, creating a niche for itself in the perfume industry.

name: RuPaul
description: RuPaul is a multifaceted personality known primarily for his work in the entertainment industry as a drag performer, singer, and television personality. The brand "RuPaul" includes a range of products, including fragrances that reflect his vibrant persona and style. The company's fragrance line aims to empower individuals by celebrating self-expression and individuality, resonating with fans of the drag culture and the larger LGBTQ+ community. RuPaul's perfumes are often marketed with a focus on love, acceptance, and glamor, embodying the essence of his public persona.

name: Ruth Mastenbroek
description: Ruth Mastenbroek is a British perfumer known for creating fine fragrances that reflect her expertise and passion for scent. Founded by Ruth Mastenbroek, the company aims to produce evocative perfumes that tell a story and evoke emotions. Ruth's background in fragrance development and her commitment to artisanal craftsmanship set her apart in the perfume industry. The brand specializes in high-quality, bespoke perfumes, with a focus on using natural ingredients and sustainable practices. Ruth Mastenbroek is known for previously working with luxury brands, and she imbues her own products with the same quality and artistry found in high-end fragrances.

name: Ryan Richmond
description: Ryan Richmond is a contemporary perfume brand that blends modern aesthetics with classic perfumery techniques. Founded by fragrance innovator Ryan Richmond, the company focuses on creating unique scents that cater to diverse tastes. Their offerings are characterized by high-quality ingredients and creative compositions, aimed at consumers who appreciate the artistry of fragrance. The brand has gained recognition for its dedication to sustainability and ethical practices within the perfume industry, emphasizing a connection to nature in their scent profiles.

name: Sparkle PR
description: Sparkle PR is a public relations company specializing in the beauty and fragrance industry. They work closely with brands to enhance their presence in the market through strategic communication and relationship management. Established to amplify the unique stories of fragrance houses, Sparkle PR emphasizes creativity and innovation in promoting scents, allowing brands to connect effectively with their target audiences.

name: SheMedia
description: SheMedia is a multi-platform media company focused on empowering women through content that informs, inspires, and engages. While not primarily a perfume company, SheMedia operates within the lifestyle domain, connecting various brands, including fragrance brands targeting female consumers. The company emphasizes the importance of women's voices and perspectives in digital media and creates opportunities for partnerships and collaborations across industries, including beauty and fragrance.

name: 1st Femme
description: 1st Femme is a contemporary perfume company that specializes in creating unique and luxurious fragrances tailored for women. Founded with a passion for celebrating femininity and elegance, 1st Femme offers a curated selection of scents that evoke emotions and make lasting impressions. Their vision is to empower women to express their individuality through fragrance, focusing on high-quality ingredients and artisanal craftsmanship.

name: 5 Sens
description: 5 Sens is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating unique and artisanal fragrances inspired by various themes and emotions. Established with a passion for olfactory art, the company aims to evoke memories and experiences through carefully blended scents. They focus on high-quality ingredients and sustainable sourcing methods, catering to connoisseurs who appreciate the complexity and depth of hand-crafted perfumes.

name: Scherrer
description: Scherrer is a French perfume house established by the designer Jean-Louis Scherrer in the early 1980s. The brand is known for its elegant fragrances that often reflect the same sophisticated style as Scherrer's fashion designs. Over the years, Scherrer has cultivated a niche for creating timeless scents that appeal to discerning customers who appreciate luxury and refinement. The house emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients and classic formulations.

name: Scent Strip Perfume
description: Scent Strip Perfume is a fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality fragrance samples and discovery sets, allowing customers to explore a wide variety of scents without committing to full-sized bottles. Their unique approach combines the convenience of sample sizes with a curated selection of both mainstream and niche perfumes, catering to diverse preferences and helping consumers find their signature scents. Scent Strip Perfume focuses on accessibility and a personalized fragrance journey, presenting both established and emerging fragrance brands.

name: S.A.C.K.Y
description: S.A.C.K.Y is a niche perfume company dedicated to crafting unique and innovative fragrances that resonate with individual personalities and emotions. Established by a team of passionate perfumers, the company focuses on limited edition scents that provide personal storytelling through the art of perfume. Their specialty lies in combining rare ingredients with avant-garde formulations to deliver transformative olfactory experiences.

name: S & C Parfums
description: S & C Parfums is a boutique fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal perfumes. They focus on blending unique ingredients to craft signature scents that convey individuality and sophistication. Founded by a passionate team of fragrance experts, the company has a rich history in exploring diverse olfactory experiences while maintaining a commitment to sustainability and ethical sourcing of their materials.
address: 23 Rue de la Parfumerie, Paris, France

name: S+M Fragrances
description: S+M Fragrances is a specialized perfume company that focuses on creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances. Established with a passion for scent, the brand emphasizes unique scent combinations and sustainable sourcing for its ingredients. The company's mission is to celebrate the artistry of perfumery while promoting ethical practices in fragrance creation.

name: S. Cute
description: S. Cute is a fragrance company specializing in creating unique and affordable perfumes. The brand focuses on producing fresh, playful scents that appeal to a youthful audience. Their mission is to provide quality fragrances at accessible prices, enabling customers to express their personalities through scent. S. Cute has become known for their vibrant branding and innovative marketing strategies, often collaborating with social media influencers to reach their target demographic.

name: s.Oliver
description: s.Oliver is a German fashion brand that also offers a range of fragrances, particularly targeting a youthful audience. Established in 1969, s.Oliver has grown to become one of the leading textile companies in Europe, known for its stylish clothing and accessories. The brand emphasizes a casual and fashionable lifestyle, striving to embody contemporary trends while maintaining high-quality standards. Their fragrance line reflects this ethos, featuring various perfumes for both men and women, which aim to capture the essence of modern living.

name: S-Perfume
description: S-Perfume is a creative perfumery house known for its innovative and artistic approach to fragrance creation. Established by a team of talented perfumers and industry visionaries, the company specializes in crafting high-quality niche perfumes that embody unique stories and emotions. S-Perfume emphasizes the use of rare ingredients and artistic concepts, allowing them to stand out in a crowded market. Over the years, they have gained recognition for their avant-garde fragrance compositions and have collaborated with various artists and designers to expand their olfactory offerings.

name: S3
description: S3 is a contemporary fragrance company that focuses on creating unique and innovative perfumes that appeal to a modern audience. Established by a group of fragrance enthusiasts, S3 aims to blend traditional perfumery techniques with modern trends to craft scents that resonate with consumers. Their specialty lies in utilizing high-quality ingredients and sustainable practices to produce a line of fragrances that not only smell exquisite but also reflect a commitment to environmental responsibility.

name: S4P - Science for Peace
description: S4P - Science for Peace is a unique perfume company that focuses on creating fragrances that embody the ideals of peace and harmony. Founded on the principles of sustainability and ethical sourcing, S4P specializes in using scientifically researched ingredients that not only provide pleasant scents but also promote well-being and environmental consciousness. Their products often highlight the intersection of science and art, showcasing how thoughtful formulation can result in both beautiful fragrances and positive social impact.

name: SA Fragrances
description: SA Fragrances is a dedicated fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality, luxurious perfumes. Founded with a passion for craftsmanship and artistry in scent creation, the company prides itself on sourcing the best raw materials from around the globe. Each fragrance is a unique blend, reflecting a commitment to originality and sophistication, which caters to both individual tastes and trends in the fragrance market. Their story revolves around a blend of tradition and innovation, allowing them to stand out in the competitive perfume industry.

name: SAB
description: SAB (Scent Aromatic Bliss) is a perfume house specializing in the creation of niche fragrances. Founded with the mission to blend traditional perfumery techniques with contemporary inspirations, SAB has carved a niche for itself by focusing on high-quality, artisanal scents that appeal to connoisseurs of niche perfumes. The company draws inspiration from various cultures and landscapes, often incorporating unique and exotic ingredients to create distinct olfactory experiences.

name: Sabine Poncet
description: Sabine Poncet is a French niche perfume brand that focuses on creating unique, artisanal fragrances that reflect the richness of nature and history. Founded by perfumer Sabine Poncet, the company emphasizes individuality and quality, using carefully selected ingredients to craft scents that tell stories and evoke emotions. Sabine Poncet’s creations are characterized by their complex compositions and are aimed at a sophisticated clientele that appreciates the artistry of perfumery.

name: Sabon
description: Sabon is a beauty and personal care brand that specializes in a range of luxurious body and skincare products, including soaps, bath salts, body scrubs, and fragrances. Founded in Tel Aviv, Israel, in 1997, Sabon began as a small shop selling handmade soaps and quickly gained popularity for its artisanal approach and high-quality ingredients. The company's philosophy focuses on providing a pampering experience while promoting self-care and wellness. Over the years, Sabon has expanded its product lines and retail presence, establishing locations in various countries and becoming known for its unique blends of fragrances and effective formulas.

name: Sabrina Carpenter
description: Sabrina Carpenter has ventured into the fragrance industry with her own line of perfumes, showcasing her personal style and creative vision. As a well-known actress and singer, Carpenter’s fragrances often reflect her youthful energy and artistic expression, appealing primarily to her fan base. The brand focuses on creating accessible and appealing scents that resonate with the themes of self-expression and individuality.

name: Sachajuan
description: Sachajuan is a Swedish hair care and fragrance company founded in 2004 by hairstylists Sacha Mitic and Juan Rosenlind. Originally known for their professional hair care products, they expanded into the fragrance sector with a line that emphasizes simplicity and quality ingredients. Their perfumes are crafted with a focus on Scandinavian essences and are designed to reflect the ethos of minimalism and elegance inherent in Swedish culture.

name: Saffron James Parfums
description: Saffron James Parfums is an artisanal perfume company specializing in creating exquisite fragrances inspired by the diverse landscapes and cultures of the world. Founded by perfumer and creative director, James Daniel, the brand is known for its attention to detail and use of traditional methods melded with modern sensibilities. Each scent reflects a journey, often emphasizing unique ingredients and storytelling to evoke particular emotions and memories. The brand's commitment to sustainability and eco-friendly practices further enhances its appeal in the niche perfume market.

name: Saffron
description: Saffron is a luxury fragrance house known for its exquisite and unique scents that often incorporate traditional and exotic ingredients, with an emphasis on artisanal craftsmanship. The brand's story begins with a passion for the art of perfumery, focusing on creating high-quality, rare fragrances that evoke an emotional response. Saffron specializes in blending signature notes that capture the essence of nature and culture, often utilizing saffron as a prominent ingredient, which symbolizes luxury and richness in its perfumes.

name: Sage Machado
description: Sage Machado is a niche perfume company founded by Sage Machado in 2000, known for its artistic approach to fragrance crafting. The brand focuses on small-batch production and employs natural ingredients to create perfumes that evoke emotions and stories. Each scent is designed to be unique, reflecting the aesthetic sensibilities and experiences of the founder. Sage Machado also emphasizes the use of eco-friendly and sustainable practices in its production processes, appealing to a growing audience of environmentally conscious consumers.

name: Sage
description: Sage is a specialty perfume company known for its natural and eco-friendly fragrance products. Founded on the principles of sustainability and wellness, Sage creates artisanal scents using carefully chosen ingredients that evoke a sense of place and promote emotional well-being. The company offers a range of fragrances, body care products, and wellness-focused items, while also prioritizing ethical sourcing and environmentally conscious practices. Over the years, Sage has built a loyal customer base by combining creativity in scent formulation with a commitment to health and the environment.

name: Saguara Perfumes
description: Saguara Perfumes is a niche fragrance house that specializes in creating artisanal perfumes inspired by nature and cultural heritage. The company prides itself on handcrafting its fragrances with a focus on high-quality, sustainable ingredients sourced from various regions around the world. Saguara’s story begins with a passion for storytelling through scent, aiming to evoke emotions and memories associated with the natural and cultural elements of the landscapes they draw inspiration from.

name: Sahlini
description: Sahlini is a perfume company known for its focus on creating unique and high-quality fragrances inspired by Middle Eastern heritage. The brand emphasizes artisanal craftsmanship, combining traditional scent-making techniques with modern sensibilities. Sahlini's offerings often feature exotic ingredients and are characterized by their rich, complex scents that cater to a discerning clientele seeking distinctive olfactory experiences.

name: SAI New York
description: SAI New York is a niche perfume company that specializes in crafting unique and innovative fragrances inspired by diverse cultures and environments. Established by a team of fragrance enthusiasts, the company aims to blend art and science in perfume-making, focusing on high-quality ingredients and artisanal craftsmanship. Their story emphasizes a commitment to sustainability and a multifaceted approach to scent creation, catering to individuals seeking distinctive olfactory experiences that tell a story.

name: Saint Charles
description: Saint Charles is a niche perfume company that focuses on crafting artisanal fragrances, offering unique and high-quality scents created with fine ingredients. Founded by a passionate perfumer, Saint Charles has carved a niche in the fragrance industry by emphasizing sustainability and craftsmanship in their production process. The brand is known for its distinct approach to scent creation, melding traditional techniques with modern aesthetics, appealing to fragrance connoisseurs who appreciate individuality and sophistication in their perfume choices.

name: Saint Cyr
description: Saint Cyr is a luxury perfume company known for its high-quality fragrances that draw inspiration from historical and cultural elements. The brand emphasizes artisanal craftsmanship and employs traditional techniques to create unique scents. Their story revolves around a commitment to quality and the art of perfumery, appealing to those who appreciate exclusive and sophisticated fragrances.

name: Saint-Gobain Desjonquères
description: Saint-Gobain Desjonquères is a renowned company specializing in the manufacture and distribution of glass containers specifically for the perfume, cosmetics, and pharmaceutical industries. Established in the 18th century, it has become a prominent player in the glass manufacturing sector, known for its innovative designs and high-quality products. The company has a legacy of craftsmanship in glass making and has adapted modern technologies to enhance efficiency and sustainability in its operations. Its expertise caters to luxury brands, providing bespoke solutions to meet the unique needs of the fragrance industry.

name: Saint Hilaire
description: Saint Hilaire is a French perfume company that creates a diverse range of fragrances inspired by nature and artisanal craftsmanship. Founded with a mission to make luxury accessible, the brand focuses on high-quality ingredients and sustainable practices. They offer an array of scents for both men and women, emphasizing innovation and creativity in their fragrance compositions.

name: Saint James
description: Saint James is a French perfume company that specializes in crafting high-quality, artisanal fragrances inspired by the rich maritime history and cultural heritage of the Saint James region in France. The company emphasizes the use of natural ingredients and sustainable practices in its perfume-making process, ensuring that each scent tells a story of the coastal environment and local craftsmanship.

name: Sainte Cellier
description: Sainte Cellier is a luxury fragrance brand that emphasizes the art of perfumery through the creation of exquisite, small-batch perfumes. The company has a rich heritage in traditional perfuming techniques, focusing on the use of natural ingredients sourced from around the world. Sainte Cellier prides itself on crafting unique scents that embody elegance and sophistication, making them highly sought after by fragrance connoisseurs.

name: Sakamichi
description: Sakamichi is an innovative perfume house that specializes in creating unique, artisanal fragrances inspired by Japanese culture and nature. Founded by a team of fragrance enthusiasts and artisans, the brand focuses on blending traditional techniques with modern olfactory creativity. Their perfumes often reflect the beauty and essence of Japan’s diverse landscapes and cultural heritage, appealing to consumers seeking distinct and high-quality scents.

name: Saks Fifth Avenue
description: Saks Fifth Avenue is a premier American luxury department store that offers a curated selection of fine fragrances, among other luxury goods including designer clothing, accessories, and home products. The company was founded in 1924 and is known for its high-end shopping experience, featuring top perfume brands and exclusive scents. Saks Fifth Avenue is recognized for its unparalleled customer service and promotional events, which often include fragrance launches and personal consultations to enhance the shopping experience.
address: 611 5th Ave, New York, NY 10022, United States

name: Sali Oguri
description: Sali Oguri is an innovative perfume brand that focuses on creating unique and expressive scents. Founded by the renowned perfumer Sali Oguri, the company prides itself on its artisanal approach to fragrance; combining traditional techniques with modern sensibilities. The brand is known for its dedication to sustainable practices, sourcing raw materials ethically while crafting fragrances that evoke the emotions and memories of those who wear them. Their specialty lies in creating personal, niche fragrances that celebrate individuality.

name: Salle Privée
description: Salle Privée is a luxury perfume house that specializes in creating exclusive and high-quality fragrances. Founded by Frédéric Malle in 2018, the brand focuses on artistic expression through scent, blending traditional craftsmanship with innovative approaches to fragrance creation. Their perfumes often draw inspiration from various artistic influences and perspectives, establishing a strong connection to art and culture in each composition. With an emphasis on quality ingredients and distinctive olfactory experiences, Salle Privée aims to redefine luxury fragrance.

name: Salle
description: Salle is an innovative perfume company known for its artistic approach to fragrance creation. Founded by a team of passionate scent enthusiasts, Salle focuses on high-quality, unique scent compositions that often draw inspiration from various artistic disciplines. The company places a strong emphasis on sustainable sourcing of ingredients and aims to create fragrances that evoke emotional experiences and memories. Their specialty lies in crafting unisex fragrances that cater to a diverse audience, making each scent a personal statement for the wearer.

name: Sally Hansen
description: Sally Hansen is a well-known brand primarily recognized for its nail care products, including nail polish, treatments, and removers. While the company has a strong presence in the beauty sector, it does not specialize distinctly in perfumes. Founded in 1946, Sally Hansen has a mission to empower beauty enthusiasts with innovative nail care solutions that enhance their creativity and individual style.

name: Salming
description: Salming is a Swedish sports brand that specializes in manufacturing athletic equipment, including running shoes and apparel. Although primarily known for its sports gear, it also offers a line of perfumes designed to capture the essence of an active lifestyle. The brand focuses on performance, functionality, and style, catering to athletes and fitness enthusiasts.

name: Salt & Stone
description: Salt & Stone is a California-based brand that specializes in creating natural and eco-friendly fragrances as well as skincare products. Founded by a former pro surfer, the company is dedicated to using high-quality, sustainably sourced ingredients and environmentally conscious practices. Their fragrances are designed to evoke the natural beauty and essence of the coastal lifestyle, making them unique in both scent composition and branding. Salt & Stone emphasizes minimalism and purity in its formulations, aiming to provide customers with products that are not only effective but also kind to the planet.

name: Salt & Straw
description: Salt & Straw is an artisan ice cream company founded in Portland, Oregon, known for its innovative and seasonal flavors that showcase local ingredients. Originally starting as an ice cream shop, they have collaborated with various artisans and local producers to create unique flavor profiles. Although primarily recognized for ice cream, Salt & Straw launched a line of fragrances inspired by their signature flavors, reflecting their creative approach to food and scent. Their specialty lies in blending culinary inspiration with perfumery, offering a unique experience for customers.

name: Salt Trade
description: Salt Trade is a niche perfume company that creates artisanal fragrances inspired by nature and travel. Their unique approach involves sourcing rare and sustainable materials from around the world, reflecting a deep commitment to environmental responsibility. The company emphasizes storytelling in its products, capturing the essence of locations and experiences through scent. They strive to provide consumers with a sensory journey, highlighting their connection to the world.

name: Salum
description: Salum is a niche perfume house known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. With a focus on high-quality ingredients and unique scent profiles, Salum aims to craft distinct, emotionally evocative perfumes. The brand's story is rooted in a passion for personal expression through aroma, drawing inspiration from diverse cultures and natural environments. Salum specializes in creating limited edition fragrances that cater to a discerning clientele who appreciate the artistry of perfumery.
address: 15 Rue de la Parfumerie, Paris, France

name: Salvador Dali
description: Salvador Dali Parfums is a perfume brand inspired by the work and personality of the iconic surrealist artist Salvador Dalí. The brand, which started developing fragrances in the 1980s, aims to create unique olfactory experiences that reflect Dalí's avant-garde spirit and artistic vision. The fragrances often feature imaginative packaging, invoking Dalí's distinctive style and characteristics. The company specializes in offering a range of fragrances that blend artistic innovation with olfactory creativity, appealing to both art lovers and fragrance enthusiasts.

name: Salvatore Ferragamo
description: Salvatore Ferragamo is an Italian luxury brand known for its exquisite footwear, leather goods, and fashion accessories. Established in the early 20th century, the company began as a bespoke shoemaker in Florence, founded by Salvatore Ferragamo himself, who became famous for his innovative designs and craftsmanship. As the brand expanded, it started producing fragrances, entering the perfume industry with the same emphasis on quality and sophistication that defines its other products. Salvatore Ferragamo fragrances are characterized by a blend of elegance, audacity, and sensuality, often inspired by the iconic designs of the brand's fashion collections. The company today continues to uphold its legacy by creating perfumes that encapsulate the essence of Italian luxury.

name: Salvatore Regio
description: Salvatore Regio is a niche perfume house that specializes in crafting unique fragrances with an Italian flair. The brand is known for its artistic approach to perfumery, often combining traditional methods with modern creative influences. Salvatore Regio focuses on high-quality ingredients and believes in storytelling through scent, making each fragrance a personal experience for the wearer. The company has gained recognition for its limited edition releases and bespoke services, catering to customers who seek individuality in their fragrance choices.

name: Sam Edelman
description: Sam Edelman is primarily recognized as a footwear brand, but they have diversified into fragrances as part of their lifestyle offerings. Founded by designer Sam Edelman and his partner, they focus on creating high-quality and stylish products that reflect a modern and chic aesthetic. The fragrance line embodies the same spirit of creativity and fashion-forward thinking that defines their shoes and accessories, aiming to captivate consumers with appealing scents that represent an effortless, carefree lifestyle.

name: Samanda
description: Samanda is a burgeoning perfume company known for crafting unique and artisanal fragrances that emphasize natural ingredients and sustainability. The brand emerged from a passion for perfumery and aims to offer exquisite scents that resonate with the individuality of its users. Samanda combines traditional techniques with modern sensibilities, ensuring each fragrance tells a compelling story while appealing to contemporary consumers seeking authenticity.

name: Samantha Faiers
description: Samantha Faiers is a British television personality and entrepreneur who launched her own line of perfumes, appealing primarily to her fan base and the broader fragrance market. Known for its chic and feminine scents, Samantha Faiers’ perfume collection reflects her personal style and lifestyle brand. Faiers gained fame from reality TV and leveraged her popularity by creating products that resonate with her audience, focusing on quality and elegance in fragrance creation.

name: Samar
description: Samar is a fragrance company known for its unique and evocative scents that draw inspiration from diverse cultural heritages. The company specializes in creating artisanal perfumes that resonate with individuality and creativity, crafted from high-quality ingredients sourced globally. Samar's story is rooted in a passion for perfumery and a commitment to sustainability, making each fragrance not just a scent but an experience that reflects personal and cultural narratives.

name: Samouraï
description: Samouraï is a fragrance company established in the 1990s that draws inspiration from the Japanese samurai culture. The brand is known for creating bold, distinctive scents that evoke a sense of adventure and strength, often emphasizing themes of honor and tradition. Their products typically cater to both men and women and include a range of Eau de Toilettes, body sprays, and other personal care items. Positioned at the intersection of elegance and authenticity, Samouraï has developed a loyal following among consumers looking for unique and evocative fragrances.

name: Sampter's
description: Sampter's is a unique perfume house known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Established with a vision to blend tradition and innovation, the company specializes in crafting high-quality perfumes that evoke emotion and memories. With a commitment to using natural ingredients and sustainable practices, Sampter's has created a niche in the market for individuals seeking personalized and evocative scents.

name: Sana Jardin
description: Sana Jardin is a niche perfume company known for creating luxurious fragrances that are inspired by the rich culture of Morocco. Founded by Amy Christiansen Si-Ahmed, the brand is celebrated for its commitment to sustainability and female empowerment in the fragrance industry. Sana Jardin focuses on providing unique olfactory experiences while using ethical practices, including sourcing raw materials from local Moroccan communities and embracing a circular economy model where used perfume bottles are returned for reuse.

name: Sanae Intoxicants
description: Sanae Intoxicants is a niche perfume company known for its artisanal and evocative fragrances that draw inspiration from natural and cultural elements. The company focuses on creating unique scent experiences that aim to transport users to different worlds. Founded by a passionate perfumer, Sanae Intoxicants takes pride in meticulously crafting each fragrance using high-quality ingredients and innovative techniques, establishing a distinct market presence among fragrance enthusiasts.

name: Sanborns
description: Sanborns is a well-known retail chain and department store in Mexico that also operates in the perfume industry. Originally founded as a bookstore in 1903, Sanborns has grown to become a significant hub for lifestyle products, including a variety of fragrances. The company specializes in bringing both international and domestic perfume brands to the Mexican market, offering a diverse assortment of products that cater to different tastes and preferences. Over the years, Sanborns has established itself not only as a retail destination but also as a cultural icon within Mexico, providing a unique shopping experience.

name: Sanctuary
description: Sanctuary is a wellness and beauty brand known for its luxurious range of products including fragrances, skincare, and body care. The company's ethos revolves around creating a sense of sanctuary and self-care through immersive experiences and high-quality formulations. They emphasize the use of natural ingredients and have a strong commitment to sustainability, aiming to provide products that enhance well-being while being environmentally friendly.

name: Sanctum Soho
description: Sanctum Soho is a luxury scent brand that draws inspiration from the vibrant ethos of Soho, London. They specialize in creating unique, artisanal perfumes that evoke the eclectic spirit and energy of the area. The brand is committed to using high-quality, natural ingredients to craft distinctive fragrances that resonate with individuality and creativity. Their story is rooted in a passion for the arts and a tribute to the diverse culture of Soho, making them a standout in the niche perfume market.

name: Sand + Fog
description: Sand + Fog is a lifestyle brand known for its artisanal candles and fragrance products. Established with a vision of creating high-quality home scents that evoke positivity and warmth, the company specializes in crafting unique fragrances inspired by nature and personal experiences. Their product line includes candles, diffusers, and room sprays, focusing on using clean ingredients and sustainable practices. Sand + Fog is dedicated to enhancing everyday moments with delightful scents, making it a popular choice among consumers who appreciate both aesthetics and quality.

name: Sandovalis
description: Sandovalis is a niche perfume house that specializes in creating unique and artisanal fragrances inspired by the enchanting essence of nature and cultural experiences. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, the brand focuses on quality ingredients and craftsmanship, ensuring that each fragrance tells a story and evokes emotion. Sandovalis embraces the art of fragrance-making by blending traditional methods with innovative approaches, aiming to bring a sensory journey to its customers through thoughtfully composed scents.

name: Sandro
description: Sandro is a French fashion luxury brand that was founded in 1984 by Moroccan-born designer Evelyne Chetrite. The brand is known for its modern, chic, and effortless style, focusing primarily on ready-to-wear collections for men and women. Sandro entered the fragrance market to complement its fashion lines, offering perfumes that embody the elegance and sophistication reflected in its clothing designs. The fragrances typically feature fresh, floral, and sophisticated notes that appeal to the contemporary consumer seeking a sense of luxury.

name: Sanofi Beauté
description: Sanofi Beauté is a prominent fragrance and cosmetics company known for creating innovative and high-quality perfumes. Part of the larger Sanofi group, which initially focused on health and pharmaceuticals, Sanofi Beauté specializes in the development and marketing of fragrances that resonate with modern trends while respecting the tradition of fine perfumery. The company is committed to sustainability and ethical sourcing of ingredients, offering an array of fragrances that appeal to diverse consumer preferences.

name: Sanrio [Hello Kitty]
description: Sanrio Co., Ltd. is a Japanese company best known for its creation of the iconic character Hello Kitty and several other character brands. Founded in 1960, Sanrio specializes in designing, developing, and licensing products featuring its characters, including fragrances, stationery, fashion, and accessories. The company has cultivated a significant cultural impact by promoting various forms of merchandise that resonate with fans worldwide, particularly through collaborations with artists and other brands. Sanrio’s approach combines kawaii (cute) culture with lifestyle products, setting it apart in the global market.
address: 3411 W. 6th Street, Los Angeles, CA 90020, USA (Sanrio's U.S. office)

name: Sans Soucis
description: Sans Soucis is a German perfume and cosmetics brand that specializes in skincare and scent products that promote well-being. Founded on the principles of beauty and nature, the company emphasizes the use of natural ingredients to enhance skin health and fragrance experiences. Their products are infused with minerals from the thermal waters of Baden-Baden, aiming to create a holistic approach to beauty. Over the years, they have developed a loyal customer base in Europe and beyond, celebrating the synergy between beauty and wellness.

name: Santa Eulalia
description: Santa Eulalia is a luxury boutique established in Barcelona, Spain, known for its exclusive selection of high-end fashion and niche perfumery. Founded in 1843, it has become a reference point for contemporary and avant-garde pieces, emphasizing craftsmanship and unique design. The company carries a curated range of artisanal perfumes, focusing on quality and originality, and often collaborates with emerging and established fragrance houses to offer unique scents.
address: Carrer de Pau Claris, 167, 08037 Barcelona, Spain

name: Santa Maria Novella
description: Santa Maria Novella is one of the oldest pharmacies in the world, established in Florence, Italy. Founded by monks of the Dominical Order in 1221, it produces luxury perfumes, cosmetics, and wellness products. Known for its natural formulation and artisan craftsmanship, Santa Maria Novella specializes in high-quality fragrances inspired by historical botanical recipes, and offers a unique range of scents derived from various herbs, flowers, and spices. Their products reflect a deep sense of tradition and elegance, making them highly sought after in the niche fragrance market.
address: Via della Scala, 16, 50123 Firenze FI, Italy

name: Sante
description: Sante is a perfume company that focuses on creating unique and high-quality fragrances with an emphasis on natural ingredients. Founded in the spirit of sustainability, Sante prides itself on crafting scents that are not only aromatic but also environmentally friendly, appealing to individuals who value eco-conscious products. The brand has gained recognition for its artisanal approach, using traditional techniques combined with innovative practices to develop distinctive scents that resonate with consumers.

name: Santi Burgas
description: Santi Burgas is a niche perfume house renowned for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Founded by master perfumer Santi Burgas, the company blends traditional techniques with modern inspiration to craft unique scents that are often influenced by cultural and artistic themes. Their commitment to quality is reflected in the use of premium ingredients and the limited production of their fragrances, making them a sought-after choice for connoisseurs of fine perfumes.

name: Santini
description: Santini is a renowned fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality perfumes with a focus on artisanal craftsmanship. Established with a passion for olfactory artistry, Santini combines innovative scent compositions with traditional techniques, drawing inspiration from nature and art. The brand has developed a loyal following for its unique and sophisticated fragrances that cater to discerning customers looking for exclusivity and elegance in their scent choices.

name: SAP
description: SAP, a specialized perfume company, is renowned for its unique scent compositions that fusion floral, woody, and oriental elements. Established by a team of fragrance developers and perfumers, SAP focuses on creating high-quality fragrances that resonate with diverse customer preferences. The company emphasizes the sustainability aspect of perfume-making, sourcing ingredients ethically and ensuring environmentally-friendly production practices.

name: Saperpa
description: Saperpa is a specialized perfume company that focuses on the creation of high-quality and unique fragrances. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers, Saperpa emphasizes the art of scent crafting, blending traditional techniques with modern innovations. The company is known for sourcing rare ingredients and creating signature scents that evoke emotions and memories, catering primarily to fragrance enthusiasts who appreciate niche offerings.

name: Saponifere
description: Saponifere is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating artisanal fragrances inspired by nature and traditional art forms. They focus on high-quality ingredients and sustainable practices, producing unique scents that reflect various cultural and artisanal heritages. Established by a team of passionate perfumers, Saponifere aims to combine the art of perfumery with a commitment to environmental responsibility, resulting in luxury perfumes that tell a story and invite exploration through scent.

name: Saponificio Varesino
description: Saponificio Varesino is a historic Italian company specializing in the production of high-quality artisanal soaps and grooming products. Established in 1945 in Varese, Italy, the brand is renowned for its commitment to craftsmanship and the use of traditional methods. Saponificio Varesino also incorporates the use of rare and unique ingredients, often drawing inspiration from Italian culture and its rich history in perfumery. While primarily known for its soaps, the company has expanded its line to include fragrances and aftershaves, appealing to a niche market of discerning consumers looking for luxury personal care products.

name: Sapphire Studios
description: Sapphire Studios is a niche perfume house that specializes in creating unique and artisanal fragrances. Founded by a group of passionate scent enthusiasts, the company is dedicated to crafting high-quality perfumes that blend traditional methods with innovative elements. Their story began in a small studio where they experimented with various natural ingredients to develop their distinctive scent profiles. The brand is known for its artistic approach and limited production, ensuring each fragrance tells a story through its carefully selected notes.

name: Sara Lee
description: Sara Lee is primarily known for its food and beverage products, but it also has a footprint in the beauty and personal care sector, which includes fragrance lines. The company has a long history, emphasizing high-quality products that cater to consumers' desires. Sara Lee has evolved over the years, consolidating its operations and focusing on its core competencies in the consumer goods segment. The fragrance offerings from Sara Lee often emphasize pleasant, approachable scents that appeal to a wide audience.
